img_summary: The image depicts a decorative dish containing dark spherical items, likely representing the "Iron Pellet" from *Black Myth: Wukong*. According to the surrounding text, the Iron Pellet is a rare consumable item that, when used with the gourd, prevents interruptions from incoming attacks and provides significant damage reduction. It is obtained by purchasing it from the Man-In-Stone after defeating him and completing his quest in Yellow Wind Ridge.
